otherNames: Emperor-in-Law, Dì Xu, Emperor Son-in-Law, Son-in-Law of the Emperor, 帝婿
synopsis: An ordinary self-funded university student suddenly acquires a rich, mature wife and activates the ‘Life Decision System.’ Does this system provide options that will become reality upon choosing them? Little children make choices; I want everything! Find out how Lifan, the son-in-law of a wealthy family, counterattacks little by little with the system in hand to become this generation’s greatest son-in-law!
